verses.text: In thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, do I put my \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*; let me \w never|strong="H0408"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* me in thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

Bow \w down|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* to me; \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me \w speedily|strong="H4120"\w*: be thou my \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, for an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w defence|strong="H4686"\w* to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me.\f + \fr 31.2 \ft my…: Heb. to me for a rock of strength\f*

For thou \add art\add* my \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* and my \w fortress|strong="H4686"\w*; therefore for thy \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me, and \w guide|strong="H5095"\w* me.
Pull me \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w that|strong="H2098"\w* they have laid \w privily|strong="H2934"\w* for me: for thou \add art\add* my \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*.

Into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* I \w commit|strong="H6485"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*: thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

I have \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* them that \w regard|strong="H8104"\w* \w lying|strong="H7723"\w* \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*: but I \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

I will be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*: for thou hast \w considered|strong="H7200"\w* my \w trouble|strong="H6040"\w*; thou hast \w known|strong="H3045"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* in \w adversities|strong="H6869"\w*;

And hast not shut me \w up|strong="H5462"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: thou hast \w set|strong="H5975"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* in a large \w room|strong="H4800"\w*.

Have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for I am in \w trouble|strong="H6887"\w*: mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* is \w consumed|strong="H6244"\w* with \w grief|strong="H3708"\w*, \add yea\add*, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* and my \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*.

For my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* is \w spent|strong="H3615"\w* with \w grief|strong="H3015"\w*, and my \w years|strong="H8141"\w* with \w sighing|strong="H0585"\w*: my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w faileth|strong="H3782"\w* because of mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* are \w consumed|strong="H6244"\w*.

I was a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* among all mine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*, but \w especially|strong="H3966"\w* among my \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, and a \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* to mine \w acquaintance|strong="H3045"\w*: they that did \w see|strong="H7200"\w* me \w without|strong="H2351"\w* \w fled|strong="H5074"\w* from me.

I am \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* as a dead \w man|strong="H4191"\w* out of \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*: I am like a \w broken|strong="H0006"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 31.12 \ft a broken…: Heb. a vessel that perisheth\f*

For I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w slander|strong="H1681"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: \w fear|strong="H4032"\w* \add was\add* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*: while they took \w counsel|strong="H3245"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* against me, they \w devised|strong="H2161"\w* to take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.
But I \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

My \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \add are\add* in thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and from them that \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* me.
Make thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H0215"\w* upon thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me for thy \w mercies’|strong="H2617"\w* sake.

Let me not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon thee: let the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \add and\add* let them be \w silent|strong="H1826"\w* in the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*.\f + \fr 31.17 \ft silent…: or, cut off for\f*

Let the \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* be put to \w silence|strong="H0481"\w*; which \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w grievous|strong="H6277"\w* things \w proudly|strong="H1346"\w* and \w contemptuously|strong="H0937"\w* against the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.\f + \fr 31.18 \ft grievous…: Heb. a hard thing\f*

\add Oh\add* how \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \add is\add* thy \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w*, which thou hast laid \w up|strong="H6845"\w* for them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* thee; \add which\add* thou hast \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* for them that \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in thee before the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*!

Thou shalt \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* them in the \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* of thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* from the \w pride|strong="H7407"\w* of \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: thou shalt keep them \w secretly|strong="H6845"\w* in a \w pavilion|strong="H5521"\w* from the \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* of \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he hath shewed me his \w marvellous|strong="H6381"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* in a \w strong|strong="H4692"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 31.21 \ft strong: or, fenced\f*

For I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in my \w haste|strong="H2648"\w*, I am cut \w off|strong="H1629"\w* from \w before|strong="H5048"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w nevertheless|strong="H0403"\w* thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w* when I \w cried|strong="H7768"\w* unto thee.

O \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all ye his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*: \add for\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w preserveth|strong="H5341"\w* the \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w*, and \w plentifully|strong="H3499"\w* \w rewardeth|strong="H7999"\w* the \w proud|strong="H1346"\w* \w doer|strong="H6213"\w*.

Be of good \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, and he shall \w strengthen|strong="H0553"\w* your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, all ye that \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
